Comment: That photo is powerful and heartbreaking, as well as the one of the injured woman. I wish more people cared about the fact that there are so many real people affected by this war. But too many people think that helping Ukraine is a "waste of taxpayer dollars":  >The president, who has long admired what he views as Putin’s strength and advocated for closer ties between the U.S. and Russia, went into his second presidency seeking to shift decades of U.S. foreign policy and bipartisan hawkishness on Russia. Republicans are increasingly behind Trump, as the MAGA political coalition sours on interventionism and views U.S. support for Kyiv as a waste of taxpayer dollars.   It's not their family and friends being affected, so they don't care.
